org.stringmatching.determinist.aho_corasick

Class AC_Trie

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stringmatching.determinist.aho_corasick.AC_Trie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class AC_Trie
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Trie Model for the Aho-Corasick method The trie is represented by a two dimensional array where the rows are the states, the columns are the pattern characters (items) and the cell value index of the next state (transition) Every Character in the patterns is mapped to reduce memory size (number of columns in the trie) but keeping a fast lookup (just an array access) Could be interesting to load a dictionary of characters (ASCII) related to the input strings
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
